# vertexAdditionalBinaryFunctions

**Instance Property**

The vertex functions to add to the render pipeline.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexAdditionalBinaryFunctions: [any MTLFunction]? { get set }
```

## Configuring the descriptor’s functions

- **fragmentAdditionalBinaryFunctions**: The fragment functions to add to the render pipeline.
- **tileAdditionalBinaryFunctions**: The tile functions to add to the render pipeline.
